name: One Man Pong
description:
I'm pretty sure you're tired of Playing overcomplicated games, I know I am.

Don't you wish you could go back to a time when things were simple and just about the fun of the game?

Well go ahead and try out One Man Pong!!! It's like playing Pong but BY YOURSELF!

Simple Click the Left Mouse Button to begin and move your mouse up and down to make sure you keep those Pong balls in check.

Don't let them get past you cuz then you Lose, and no one likes a Loser, Right?
